mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.out_type_code AS "outTypeCode", a.upload_id AS "uploadId", a.upload_time AS "uploadTime", a.scan_by AS "scanBy", a.scan_begin_time AS "scanBeginTime", a.bill_type AS "billType", a.bill_status AS "billStatus", a.submit_by AS "submitBy", a.submit_date AS "submitDate", a.send_id AS "sendId", a.send_code AS "sendCode", a.send_name AS "sendName", a.receive_id AS "receiveId", a.receive_name AS "receiveName", a.receive_phone AS "receivePhone", a.receive_address AS "receiveAddress", a.expect_pcs_qty as expectPcsPty, a.actual_pcs_qty as actualPcsPty, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rdc_out_header( id, code, order_code, out_type_code, upload_id, upload_time, scan_by, scan_begin_time, bill_type, bill_status, submit_by, submit_date, send_id, send_code, send_name, receive_id, receive_name, receive_phone, receive_address, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{orderCode}, #{outTypeCode}, #{uploadId}, #{uploadTime}, #{scanBy}, #{scanBeginTime}, #{billType}, #{billStatus}, #{submitBy}, #{submitDate}, #{sendId}, #{sendCode}, #{sendName}, #{receiveId}, #{receiveName}, #{receivePhone}, #{receiveAddress}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE rdc_out_header SET code = #{code}, order_code = #{orderCode}, out_type_code = #{outTypeCode}, upload_id = #{uploadId}, upload_time = #{uploadTime}, scan_by = #{scanBy}, scan_begin_time = #{scanBeginTime}, bill_type = #{billType}, bill_status = #{billStatus}, submit_by = #{submitBy}, submit_date = #{submitDate}, send_id = #{sendId}, send_code = #{sendCode}, send_name = #{sendName}, receive_id = #{receiveId}, receive_name = #{receiveName}, receive_phone = #{receivePhone}, receive_address = #{receiveAddress}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT rh.`id` AS rId, rh.`code`AS rCode, rh.`bill_type` AS billType, rh.`bill_status` AS billStatus, rh.`send_id` AS sendId, rh.`send_name` AS sendName, rh.`receive_id` AS receiveId, rh.`upload_id` AS uploadId, rh.`upload_time` uploadTime, rh.`submit_by` AS sumitBy, rh.`scan_by` AS scanBy, rd.`header_id` AS headerId, rd.`product_id` AS productId, p.`code` AS pCode, p.`sku` AS pSku, p.`name` AS pName, rh.`send_id` AS sendId, rh.`receive_id` AS receiveId, rd.`batch_code` AS batchId, rd.`expect_pcs_qty` AS expectPcsQty, rd.`actual_pcs_qty` AS actualPcsQty FROM rdc_out_header rh, rdc_out_detail rd, product p WHERE rh.`id` = rd.`header_id` AND rd.`product_id` = p.`id` AND rh.`send_id` = #{sendId} AND rh.`scan_by` = #{scanBy}
